seg-source.mrk: Document Editor

trans-unit.source: This lesson explains the page editor that is used for creating and editing pages.

seg-source.mrk: This lesson explains the page editor that is used for creating and editing pages.
: Document Editor

trans-unit.source: The General, Information and Universal Dlg. Settings FastTabs contain information and settings for the respective page. The data for creating the page can be found in the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: The General, Information and Universal Dlg.
Settings FastTabs contain information and settings for the respective page.
The data for creating the page can be found in the Lines FastTab.
General FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Name

trans-unit.source: Indicates the name of the document. The document is called up by the HTTP request using this name.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the name of the document.
The document is called up by the HTTP request using this name.
Note

trans-unit.source: The document name is specified without a file extension.

seg-source.mrk: The document name is specified without a file extension.
Codeunit

trans-unit.source: Specifies the object number of the codeunit to be assigned to this document, which is used to fill the layout with data.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the object number of the codeunit to be assigned to this document, which is used to fill the layout with data.
Note

trans-unit.source: Documents that do not have to be filled with dynamic data can be generated via codeunit 5308021, MS - Call Fix Document.

seg-source.mrk: Documents that do not have to be filled with dynamic data can be generated via codeunit 5308021, MS - Call Fix Document.
Codeunit Name

trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the codeunit specified in the Codeunit field.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the name of the codeunit specified in the Codeunit field.
Description

trans-unit.source: An optional description of the document

seg-source.mrk: An optional description of the document
Status

trans-unit.source: Shows the validation status of the page. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Shows the validation status of the page.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: <blank> – The document contains errors or has not yet been validated and can therefore not be called up.

seg-source.mrk: <blank> – The document contains errors or has not yet been validated and can therefore not be called up.

trans-unit.source: Released – The document has only been validated internally (without DOM) and is free from errors. It is available for calling up.

seg-source.mrk: Released – The document has only been validated internally (without DOM) and is free from errors.
It is available for calling up.

trans-unit.source: Validated – The document has been validated internally and according to DOM and is free from errors. It is available for calling up.

seg-source.mrk: Validated – The document has been validated internally and according to DOM and is free from errors.
It is available for calling up.
Note

trans-unit.source: The status can be changed manually to “<blank>” or “Released” only.

seg-source.mrk: The status can be changed manually to “<blank>” or “Released” only.
Module

trans-unit.source: Indicates the name of a module to which the page is to be assigned.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the name of a module to which the page is to be assigned.
Style Sheet File

trans-unit.source: Assigns a .css file to the document.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns a .css file to the document.
Lines FastTab

trans-unit.source: The layout of the page is specified in the Lines FastTab. The structure corresponds to a tree structure transposed to a line structure. The individual levels are indicated by indentations.

seg-source.mrk: The layout of the page is specified in the Lines FastTab.
The structure corresponds to a tree structure transposed to a line structure.
The individual levels are indicated by indentations.

trans-unit.source: A page is set up according to the parent-child principle. The top element is always the deck. The next refinement level is the data sheet. A data sheet in turn can then have various elements such as a label, text field or table. Depending on which element the child belongs to, it is indented in the display, i.e., the children of an element are always indented one level further than the element itself. All elements on the same level within an element are therefore siblings.

seg-source.mrk: A page is set up according to the parent-child principle.
The top element is always the deck.
The next refinement level is the data sheet.
A data sheet in turn can then have various elements such as a label, text field or table.
Depending on which element the child belongs to, it is indented in the display, i.e., the children of an element are always indented one level further than the element itself.
All elements on the same level within an element are therefore siblings.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Object

trans-unit.source: Contains the name of the element or attribute. Elements are shown in bold text; attributes are shown in default text.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the name of the element or attribute.
Elements are shown in bold text; attributes are shown in default text.
Value

trans-unit.source: Indicates the value for the element or attribute. For certain attributes or elements, values can be selected via the lookup.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the value for the element or attribute.
For certain attributes or elements, values can be selected via the lookup.

trans-unit.source: The system indicates which type of input is expected through the following color formats:

seg-source.mrk: The system indicates which type of input is expected through the following color formats:

trans-unit.source: Unique values are marked in green

seg-source.mrk: Unique values are marked in green

trans-unit.source: Values marked in blue require a selection from a predefined list

seg-source.mrk: Values marked in blue require a selection from a predefined list

trans-unit.source: Static values are shown in light gray

seg-source.mrk: Static values are shown in light gray
Lines FastTab, Function Menu

trans-unit.source: The Function menu on the Lines FastTab contains actions to adjust the view and edit the structure of the document lines. Most of these actions exist on the menu bar of the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: The Function menu on the Lines FastTab contains actions to adjust the view and edit the structure of the document lines.
Most of these actions exist on the menu bar of the Lines FastTab.
Submenu
Action
Description
View
Expand/Collapse

trans-unit.source: Displays all attributes and child elements of the current object in the document line. If this item is selected again, the objects are hidden.

seg-source.mrk: Displays all attributes and child elements of the current object in the document line.
If this item is selected again, the objects are hidden.
View
Expand from here (Exp.)

trans-unit.source: Displays all attributes and elements from the current position in the document line onwards.

seg-source.mrk: Displays all attributes and elements from the current position in the document line onwards.
View
Compress (Compr.)

trans-unit.source: Hides all attributes and elements from the current position in the document line onwards.

seg-source.mrk: Hides all attributes and elements from the current position in the document line onwards.
Element
Up

trans-unit.source: Moves elements and their children to another position further up in the document structure.

seg-source.mrk: Moves elements and their children to another position further up in the document structure.
Element
Down

trans-unit.source: Moves elements and their children to another position further down in the document structure.

seg-source.mrk: Moves elements and their children to another position further down in the document structure.
Copy Lines

trans-unit.source: Temporarily stores existing fragments in the document lines for the purpose of pasting them into a different place on the same page or on a different page using the “Insert Lines” function.

seg-source.mrk: Temporarily stores existing fragments in the document lines for the purpose of pasting them into a different place on the same page or on a different page using the “Insert Lines” function.
Paste Lines

trans-unit.source: Pastes the previously copied section from the document line into the current position.

seg-source.mrk: Pastes the previously copied section from the document line into the current position.
Insert Element (Element)

trans-unit.source: Opens the Object Selection page, where a possible child element – according to the schema – can be inserted.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Object Selection page, where a possible child element – according to the schema – can be inserted.
Insert Attribute (Attribute)

trans-unit.source: Opens the Object Selection page, where a possible attribute for the element – according to the schema – can be inserted.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Object Selection page, where a possible attribute for the element – according to the schema – can be inserted.
Usage of the Document Editor

trans-unit.source: When a new deck is created, the main element (deck) is automatically inserted. Starting with this element, further elements and attributes can be added by setting the focus to the Object field. The lookup provides a menu of elements and attributes that can be added to this element as the child node. If the cursor is placed in the Object field, a Lookup page can be opened, which lists all elements and attributes that can be added to the structure. Fig. 2 shows the possible elements that can be added to a Card.

seg-source.mrk: When a new deck is created, the main element (deck) is automatically inserted.
Starting with this element, further elements and attributes can be added by setting the focus to the Object field.
The lookup provides a menu of elements and attributes that can be added to this element as the child node.
If the cursor is placed in the Object field, a Lookup page can be opened, which lists all elements and attributes that can be added to the structure.
<MadCap:xref href="#_Ref429069967" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref> shows the possible elements that can be added to a Card.
: Object Selection
Note

trans-unit.source: An extensive list of all elements and attributes with their meaning and use is available in <MadCap:xref href="Appendix A.htm#_Ref429466853" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Appendix A" on page 1</MadCap:xref>, section “Definition of the Document Editor Schema”.

seg-source.mrk: An extensive list of all elements and attributes with their meaning and use is available in <MadCap:xref href="Appendix A.htm#_Ref429466853" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Appendix A" on page 1</MadCap:xref>, section “Definition of the Document Editor Schema”.

: Document Editor, Information FastTab
Field
Description

trans-unit.source: Created by / Creation Date / Last Modified by / Last Modified Date

seg-source.mrk: Created by / Creation Date / Last Modified by / Last Modified Date

trans-unit.source: Indicates when and by whom the page was created, and when and who last changed the page.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates when and by whom the page was created, and when and who last changed the page.
Frame Icon

trans-unit.source: Determines the frame icon that is displayed in the top bar if the Top Bar field = show in Mobile Setup.

seg-source.mrk: Determines the frame icon that is displayed in the top bar if the Top Bar field = show in Mobile Setup.
Universal Dlg.
Settings FastTab

trans-unit.source: The settings of this FastTab determine the individual configuration of the Universal Dialogue for the current document.

seg-source.mrk: The settings of this FastTab determine the individual configuration of the Universal Dialogue for the current document.

trans-unit.source: : Document Editor, Universal Dlg. Settings FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : Document Editor, Universal Dlg.
Settings FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Channel

trans-unit.source: Identifies a four-character code field that is a unique assignment of a channel for which the Universal Dialogue will use. Depending on this value the dialogue associates its calling codeunit.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a four-character code field that is a unique assignment of a channel for which the Universal Dialogue will use.
Depending on this value the dialogue associates its calling codeunit.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of existing dialogues is not recommended.

seg-source.mrk: Changing the value of existing dialogues is not recommended.
Title

trans-unit.source: Identfies a labeltext to specify the title that will be displayed when using the Universal Dialogue.

seg-source.mrk: Identfies a labeltext to specify the title that will be displayed when using the Universal Dialogue.
Confirm Post

trans-unit.source: Specifies if it is necessary to confirm the data before posting.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if it is necessary to confirm the data before posting.
Post per Line

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the posting occurs on each captured record or after collecting multiple records.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if the posting occurs on each captured record or after collecting multiple records.
NOTE

trans-unit.source: This feature is not supported by every dialogue.

seg-source.mrk: This feature is not supported by every dialogue.
Print

trans-unit.source: Specifies if a document should be printed after successful posting.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies if a document should be printed after successful posting.
NOTE

trans-unit.source: This feature is not supported by every dialogue.

seg-source.mrk: This feature is not supported by every dialogue.
Actions Tab

trans-unit.source: The Actions tab of the ribbon contains five actions. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Actions tab of the ribbon contains five actions.
Each is described in the following table.
Action
Description
Import/Export

trans-unit.source: Imports or exports selected document structures to or from an ASCII file using a dataport.

seg-source.mrk: Imports or exports selected document structures to or from an ASCII file using a dataport.
Validate

trans-unit.source: Checks the current document for correctness according to the schema. Depending on the settings in the editor setup, the document is checked against the schema in a DOM validation.

seg-source.mrk: Checks the current document for correctness according to the schema.
Depending on the settings in the editor setup, the document is checked against the schema in a DOM validation.
Validate All

trans-unit.source: Checks several documents for correctness according to the schema using appropriate filters.

seg-source.mrk: Checks several documents for correctness according to the schema using appropriate filters.
Copy

trans-unit.source: Duplicates complex document structures. Following the creation of a new document header, a report is started in Microsoft Dynamics NAV in which the source and target document are selected. Within the report, the document lines are copied to the target document.

seg-source.mrk: Duplicates complex document structures.
Following the creation of a new document header, a report is started in Microsoft Dynamics NAV in which the source and target document are selected.
Within the report, the document lines are copied to the target document.
Navigate Tab

trans-unit.source: The Navigate tab of the ribbon contains eight actions. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Navigate tab of the ribbon contains eight actions.
Each is described in the following table.
Action
Description
Where-used

trans-unit.source: Displays an overview of documents that are linked to the current document.

seg-source.mrk: Displays an overview of documents that are linked to the current document.
Translation

trans-unit.source: Opens the Labeltext page where translations for multiple languages can be entered. Refer to topic "Translations" on page 1.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Labeltext page where translations for multiple languages can be entered.
Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Translations.htm#_Ref429070302" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Translations" on page 1</MadCap:xref>.
Comment

trans-unit.source: Opens the Comment Sheet page where comments can be entered.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Comment Sheet page where comments can be entered.
Code Wizard

trans-unit.source: Creates an HTML file containing an example of a codeunit for the current document, which may be used as an orientation for creating the codeunit.

seg-source.mrk: Creates an HTML file containing an example of a codeunit for the current document, which may be used as an orientation for creating the codeunit.
Journal

trans-unit.source: Opens the Service Item Log page that contains detailed information about the communication between the HTTP server and Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Service Item Log page that contains detailed information about the communication between the HTTP server and Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
Setup

trans-unit.source: Opens the Mobile Setup page in order to modify the settings.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Mobile Setup page in order to modify the settings.
Statistics

trans-unit.source: Opens the Document Statistics page in which the statistics are analyzed and displayed on the basis of the Service Item Log.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Document Statistics page in which the statistics are analyzed and displayed on the basis of the Service Item Log.
Rights

trans-unit.source: Opens the Handheld Right page of the selected document.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Handheld Right page of the selected document.
